sorcer.util

Class CmdManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.CmdManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Command

    public class CmdManager
extends Object
implements Command, Runnable
    CmdManager handles command execution, that might be delegated by default back to its invoker, or executed by application specific commands. A command might be executed a separate thread by runIt commands or within the same thread by doIt commands.
